about_the_game:
Xukaackque plunges you into a nightmarish dream realm where you play as a ninja trapped in the dream of the monstrous spider, Xukaackque. Your ultimate goal: find the elusive portals that lead upwards, escaping this arachnid hell. But beware - each death drags you deeper into Xukaackque's twisted dreamscape.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Experimental Soundscape: Immerse yourself in a dark, ever-changing electro-spider music that amplifies the game's eerie atmosphere with specialized layered musical arrangements.

  • Intelligent Spider AI: Arachnids use audible cues to communicate your position, creating a hivemind dynamic hunting ground.

  • Ninja Dash: Harness a powerful dash ability to crush spiders and swiftly traverse the environment.

  • Arcane Shield: Deploy a magical barrier that repels spider attacks, adding a strategic defensive layer while being able to bounce off objects and glide.

  • Laser Shuriken: Unleash deadly ninja stars that make precision shooting while on the move effortless like they have a mind of their own.

  • Overwhelming Swarms: Face terrifying hordes of spiders that push your skills to the limit.

  • Vast, Randomized World: Every playthrough offers a unique, sprawling landscape to navigate.

Can you ascend from the depths of Xukaackque's mind, or will you become eternally entangled in this web of nightmares?"

Xukaackque plunges you into a nightmarish dream realm where you play as a ninja trapped in the dream of the monstrous spider, Xukaackque. Your ultimate goal: find the elusive portals that lead upwards, escaping this arachnid hell. But beware - each death drags you deeper into Xukaackque's twisted dreamscape.

  • Dynamic Experimental Soundscape: Immerse yourself in a dark, ever-changing electro-spider music that amplifies the game's eerie atmosphere with specialized layered musical arrangements.

  • Intelligent Spider AI: Arachnids use audible cues to communicate your position, creating a hivemind dynamic hunting ground.

  • Arcane Shield: Deploy a magical barrier that repels spider attacks, adding a strategic defensive layer while being able to bounce off objects and glide.

  • Vast, Randomized World: Every playthrough offers a unique, sprawling landscape to navigate.

Can you ascend from the depths of Xukaackque's mind, or will you become eternally entangled in this web of nightmares?"

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 or AMD FX-4350 processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 460 (4 GB) graphics
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT

name: xukaackque

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system (Windows 10 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 or AMD FX-4350 processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 460 (4 GB) graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system (Windows 10 64-bit)
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: An experimental shooter where you play a ninja trapped in a spider's nightmarish realm. An imaginary landscape to escape with hellish spider guards. Will the world ever hear your story? Are you just another one that tripped, fell into a spider web in the basement, never to return?
